type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Spawn Item

---



[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/spawn_item).

Drops an item where the action is executed.

Type ID: `apugli:spawn_item`



---
